title: Query Changes
description:
Update query logic to support agent-human workflow:
- tk next excludes awaiting != null (agent mode)
- tk next --awaiting returns tasks for humans
- tk ready excludes awaiting != null
- New filter options for awaiting field

This ensures ticker only picks up agent-ready tasks.
notes: 2026-01-14 18:28 - Completed nlt: Added IsAwaitingHuman() check in query.Ready() to exclude awaiting/manual ticks. The implementation uses the existing IsAwaitingHuman() helper from tick.go which handles both Awaiting field and legacy Manual flag. Test added to verify both cases.
